name: Blazing-squirrel
tagline: Ready for use io.js + HTML5 SQL client
body: ## Linux Install: + Download CLI driver + on Linux, install unixodbc and git: ```sh apt-get install iojs npm git unixodbc unixodbc-dev -y ``` + create a [BLAZING_SQUIRREL] driver in `odbcinst.ini` ([example](examples/linux/odbcinst.ini)) + then: ```sh git clone https://github.com/LeoDutra/blazing-squirrel.git cd blazing-squirrel npm install npm start ``` + go to [http://localhost:3000]() ## Using the FreeTDS ODBC driver [Go to node-odbc's FreeTDS driver reference](https://github.com/wankdanker/node-odbc#using-the-freetds-odbc-driver)
